{"id":950524839,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1684119266,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/950524839/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count the Number of Complete Components","memory":"43 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countCompleteComponents(int n, int[][] edges) {\n        List<List<Integer>> ls = new ArrayList<>();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            ls.add(new ArrayList<>());\n        }\n        for(int[] i: edges){\n            ls.get(i[0]).add(i[1]);\n            ls.get(i[1]).add(i[0]); \n        }\n         boolean[] vis= new boolean[n];\n         int[] c=new int[n];\n         int no=1;\n         int ans=0;\n         for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n             if(!vis[i]){\n             int curr=dfs1(ls,vis,i,c,no);\n            \n             if(check(c,curr,ls,no)){\n                 ans++;\n             }\n         }\n             no++;\n        }\n        return ans ;\n        \n    }\n     public int dfs1(List<List<Integer>> ls,boolean[] vis ,int idx,int[] c,int count){\n        vis[idx]=true;\n        c[idx]=count;\n        int ans=1;\n \n        for(int i:ls.get(idx)){\n            if(!vis[i]){\n                ans+=dfs1(ls,vis,i,c,count);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n    public boolean check(int[] c, int count,List<List<Integer>> ls,int no){\n        for(int i=0;i<c.length;i++){\n            if(c[i]==no){\n                if((ls.get(i).size())!=count-1){\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n\n    }\n \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-the-number-of-complete-components","has_notes":false}
